name: Cat Chaos
description:
1 house, 5 cats, full cat-astrophe!

These cats have a serious cattitude! They are wreaking havoc and only you can stop them! Care for your cats until the timer runs out and fix broken furniture to get a purrfect score.

Play this hissterical game meow for:

  • 5 cats with purrsonality
  • 4 cat moods with different needs
  • Multitasking and mini-games
  • A meowntain of laughter
